basics.name: Truc Nguyen
basics.label: DevOps Engineer
basics.summary:
I am a DevOps Engineer with an eye for automation since day one. Versatile team player with a deep commitment to a reliable and successful business, I am eager to learn every day at a high pace.

Based in Grenoble in the French Alps, I am keen on working remotely too.

_By the way, this resume has been automatically built and deployed on {{deployment_date}} with a GitHub Actions CI/CD workflow. Check **[the workflow](https://github.com/trucngn/resume/actions?query=workflow%3A%22Build+resume%22)** on GitHub if interested._

work.summary: Bonitasoft is a leading open source provider of Business Process Management and low-code digital transformation software.
highlights: Built from scratch a cloud native PaaS to run process-based applications on a fully managed and cost-optimized infrastructure
Set up observability and operate a Kubernetes multi-cluster and multi-tenant infrastructure with a 99.9% uptime SLA
Developed a continuous delivery solution for process-based application development and deployment
Set up CI/CD as code for development teams, making release pipelines faster and more sustainable
Managed IT infrastructure as code to ensure reliability of corporate-wise services, both on-premises and on cloud IaaS
*AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, Helm, Mozilla SOPS, Datadog, Prometheus, Python, Ansible, Terraform, Jenkins, Artifactory, Nexus, Shell, Git, Agile*

work.summary: Automated testing of a Business Process Management platform.
highlights: Built a frontend automated test framework for multi-browser end-to-end testing
Wrote deployment tests against various database vendors and J2EE application servers to cover compatibility testing
Integrated automated tests to a Jenkins CI environment
*Java, Maven, Selenium, TestNG, Jenkins, JIRA, Git, Agile*

work.summary: Moody's Analytics is an award-winning provider of risk and performance management software for financial institutions.
highlights: Built a test framework for automated GUI tests of Adobe Flex applications
Automated deployment tests against J2EE application servers
Integrated automated tests to a Jenkins CI environment
Wrote automated tests for Oracle PL/SQL stored procedures
*Python, XML, RIATest, Ant, Jenkins, Robot Framework, SQL, PL/SQL, Perforce, Agile*

work.summary: QA testing of Yahoo! Answers, the Q&A website from Yahoo!
highlights: Developed automated tests to cover non-regression testing
Run performance tests to secure the website resilience to millions daily visits
Involved in QA engineer recruitment in London
*Java, Maven, Selenium, JUnit, TestNG, XML, JSON, JMeter, Bugzilla, SVN, Agile*
